pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, September 13, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, September 13, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), Christine Lagarde.

Office of the Prime Minister, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

3:15 pm The Prime Minister will hold a joint press conference with Christine Lagarde.

House of Commons Foyer, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
